description:
The first 500 people to use my link will get a free month of Skillshare https://skl.sh/thecloserlook11241

Beetlejuice 2 was dragged down by having far too many plotlines. Here, I break it down and suggest how to make it a better movie.

I----------------------------------------------------------------------------------I

title: How Plot Bloat Can Spoil A Movie — Beetlejuice 2
